m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Ford GoDrive Car Sharing Arrives in London Ford GoDrive Car Sharing Arrives in London Drivers will be able to access 50 cars across 20 locations in London, though Ford is eyeing a U.S. launch, too. Ford is testing out the sharing economy with the launch of GoDrive in London. After a successful 100-driver pilot, the company has opened the program to 1,900 more drivers, who will be able to access 50 cars across 20 locations in the English capital.
